title: Where do you most like singing? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t sing much anymore but when I listen to a Beatles song on the car radio or YouTube, I’ll sing along. I had Sirius Beatles channel on my car radio but my car was totaled and I don’t have Sirius in my new car! But when I was a teenager, I’d sing just about anywhere! I loved to sing! But since I had two throat surgeries, I just can’t sing like I did when I was younger!

My closet! Nobody can hear me there. I’m currently working on a one person rendition of One Day More in my closet. I type this while I’m taking a break. It’s a lot of fun! I might post it too the Theater Geeks space when I’m done, but I don’t know.
